abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Pamir Private Power
            Project for Tajikistan is, through private sector
            involvement, to improve the reliability and enhance the
            quantity of supply of electricity in the Gorno Badakshan
            Autonomous Oblast (GBAO) region in a financially,
            environmentally and socially sustainable way. The changes
            are to cancel part of the grant proceeds of the Pamir
            Private Power Project Additional Financing (PPPP) in an
            amount of about SDR 768,000 (equivalent of USD 1.2 million)
            that remains unutilized by the closing date of December 31,
            2010. There will be funds remaining in the Pamir project to
            meet ongoing commitments. The request of the Government of
            Tajikistan (GOT) to recommit the cancelled funds will be
            forwarded for further consideration.
